item.title: French Onion Soup
item.description: Ingredients 1 T olive oil 3 or more onions, sliced 1 bouillon cube 4 cups water 1 T flour (optional) Directions Cook onions in oil until brown Add flour, bouillon cube, and water Bring to boil, then simmer for 1 hour Place 1 slice Italian bread topped with Swiss cheese in a bowl Top with soup
